37.eng-name: The Book of Fighting [The Prohibition of Bloodshed]

hadiths.text: Narrated from 'Abdul-A'la:A similar report was narrated from 'Abdul-A'la

chapter.ara-name: باب ذِكْرِ اخْتِلاَفِ النَّاقِلِينَ لِخَبَرِ حُمَيْدٍ عَنْ أَنَسِ بْنِ مَالِكٍ فِيهِ
chapter.eng-name: Mentioning the Differences Reported from Humaid, from Anas bin Malik
